m_szDocSumamry: News:2011:Cold Fusion Cold Fusion in the News News relating to Cold Fusion, also called Low Energy Nuclear Reactions (LENR). See other Cold Fusion news services: Cold Fusion Times | Cold Fusion Now | Current News:2012:Cold Fusion - going forward in time 2011 Featured / Top 5 : Trends > Zeitgeist > Free Energy in 2011 Prepping to Take Off in 2012 - Though the year didn't bring as many technologies to market as I had predicted last year (due to "you're not ready yet, world citizens"?), great progress was made. We highlight the Top 5 of the year and mention a few stragglers from last year, as wel
